item.description:
Fat Tuesday has long past but you have yet another chance this Friday March 12th....when the Carnival spirit takes over Ryles with the lively powerful sound of Bloco AfroBrazil.

For those who haven't been able to make the Sunday shows, now you have a chance to experience the baddest, loudest, funnest indoor carnival around. Last year, each time this group partied, I placed it on the Portuguese and Onyxbirds Meetup calendars because it always exceeded expectation. Since dinner is an option this time, I've also invited the Meetup dining group, Breakfast Brunch Lunch & Dinner as well. Let's pack the place because the more the merrier and also your presence will convince Ryles to keep the party on their schedule.

Bloco AfroBrazil is a 12-piece percussion ensemble that always puts on a spectacular show combining traditional Brazilian grooves like Samba and Axé with Funk, Rock, Jazz and even Hip Hop; add to this, Ju Marciano's explosive mix of sultry vocals as well as beautiful dancers and you got a recipe for FUN, Brazilian style!! Bring your dance shoes or socks and leave your worries at the door!!

Bring your friends....I guarantee a funtastic time, that is if you like your music strong and your party loud.

Get there when you can. Don't be shy...Say hi, to the friendly folks seated in the dining area at the tables against the wall, to the right of the stage.

Ryles Dinner Menu

You must be at least 21 but you don't have to drink, just enjoy each others company and an AMAZING! show.

Learn Samba and Brazilian Afro Dance

Once the drumming, singing and dancing start, group conversation is difficult. Let's just enjoy the party!


$10 cash cover charge at the door
or
$12.50 online with credit card at http://ryles.intertic...


Bloco AfroBrazil details

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU



DIRECTIONS:

From Points West:
Take I-90 (Mass Pike) to Exit 18 bearing right toward Allston/Cambridge. At the end of the exit pass through two sets of lights traveling over the Charles River, continue straight onto River Street.
Take River Street through Central Square crossing Over Massachusetts Avenue where River Street turns into Prospect Street.
At Fourth traffic light (Hess Gas Station) take LEFT onto Hampshire Street.
Ryles Jazz Club is located at 212 Hampshire Street.

From Points South:
Follow 93 North into Downtown Boston.
Take Exit 26, Storrow Drive.
At the bottom of the Exit proceed onto Storrow Drive.• Bear LEFT on Storrow
Drive and take the first LEFT hand exit (Kendall Sq.).
Bear RIGHT on the exit ramp following the signs for Kendall Square Cambridge, 3N.
Pass over the Longfellow Bridge and continue straight onto Main Street.
Follow Main Street straight onto Broadway (The Marriott Hotel will be on your left).
At the Fourth set of lights take a RIGHT onto Hampshire Street.
Continue on Hampshire Street for 0.6 miles.
Ryles Jazz Club is located on 212 Hampshire Street.

From Points North:
Follow 93 North into Downtown Boston.
At the end of the exit ramp at the light, take a LEFT following the signs to the
Museum of Science. Take the first RIGHT following Route 28 North (The Museum of Science will be on the left).
Proceed past two sets of lights, at the third light bear LEFT onto Cambridge Street.
Continue approximately 1.1 miles on Cambridge street, take LEFT onto Prospect Street.
Take first RIGHT onto Hampshire Street.

PARKING:
1) Free in the two S&S Restaurant lots on Hampshire Street
2) Free behind the 7-11 (store) on Hampshire Street across from Hess Gas Station on Hampshire Street near Prospect Street
3) Municipal lot on Springfield Street off of Cambridge Street behind 1369 Coffee House at 1369 Cambridge Street and Ole Mexican Grill at 11 Springfield Street meter parking in effect 6pm til 10pm at $2/hour max 4 hours buy ticket from machine in lot then place in window
4) Hampshire Street, Beacon Street and Cambridge Street parking READ SIGNS TO AVOID HAVING YOUR VEHICLE TICKETED AND/OR TOWED
5) Last resort Cambridge Hospital garage $7 for 3 hrs $8 for 4 hrs $10 for 5 hrs $13 for 6 hrs



PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:

Create your route at http://mbta.com/... or http://www.hopstop.co...

The 69, 83 and 91 buses also run through (or near) Inman Square
item.how_to_find_us: Seated in the dining area at the tables against the wall to the right of the stage.
item.name: Brazilian Happy Hour Party at Ryles Friday March 12th at 9PM
